languages.text: "Ага, ты прикончишь убийц и поклянешься отомстить их хозяину. Расправишься с ним и пойдешь искать того, кто виновен "на самом деле". Признай, тебе либо нравится это, либо ты просто боишься остановиться".

"Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."
languages.original_text: "Ага, ты прикончишь убийц и поклянешься отомстить их хозяину. Расправишься с ним и пойдешь искать того, кто виновен "на самом деле". Признай, тебе либо нравится это, либо ты просто боишься остановиться".

traits.locale_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “可不是嘛，你干掉了那群凶手，之后发誓要向他们的主子复仇。等你前脚把他们的主子解决了，后脚你就要再找一个所谓的幕后‘真凶’。承认了吧，你就是乐在其中，或者你只是不敢停下来。”
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛，你干掉了那群凶手，之后发誓要向他们的主子复仇。等你前脚把他们的主子解决了，后脚你就要再找一个所谓的幕后‘真凶’。承认了吧，你就是乐在其中，或者你只是不敢停下来。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez tué les assassins de vos frères et juré de vous venger de leur maître, que vous avez massacré à son tour avant de vous mettre à la recherche du "vrai" coupable. Allez, avouez plutôt que vous adorez ça... ou que vous avez peur de vous arrêter. »
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez tué les assassins de vos frères et juré de vous venger de leur maître, que vous avez massacré à son tour avant de vous mettre à la recherche du "vrai" coupable. Allez, avouez plutôt que vous adorez ça... ou que vous avez peur de vous arrêter. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Claro, mata a los asesinos y jura venganza contra su amo. Y cuando lo despache, irá a buscar al "verdadero" culpable. Admita que le gusta... o tal vez que le da miedo detenerse».
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: «Claro, mata a los asesinos y jura venganza contra su amo. Y cuando lo despache, irá a buscar al "verdadero" culpable. Admita que le gusta... o tal vez que le da miedo detenerse».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろん、殺人者を仕留め、そのマスターに復讐を誓う。犯人を始末し、真犯人が誰であるかを探す。ただ、それを楽しんでいる、あるいはやめるのが怖いだけだと認めて」
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、殺人者を仕留め、そのマスターに復讐を誓う。犯人を始末し、真犯人が誰であるかを探す。ただ、それを楽しんでいる、あるいはやめるのが怖いだけだと認めて」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Klar, Ihr tötet die Mörder und schwört Rache an ihrem Meister. Ihr beseitigt ihn und sucht dann nach dem 'wahren' Täter. Gebt doch einfach zu, dass es Euch Spaß macht — oder dass Ihr einfach Angst habt, aufzuhören."
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: "Klar, Ihr tötet die Mörder und schwört Rache an ihrem Meister. Ihr beseitigt ihn und sucht dann nach dem 'wahren' Täter. Gebt doch einfach zu, dass es Euch Spaß macht — oder dass Ihr einfach Angst habt, aufzuhören."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

languages.text: "Tabii, katillerin işini bitirip efendilerinden intikam almaya yemin et. Onu da öldür, sonra da 'gerçek' suçluyu aramaya koyul. İtiraf et, ya bu huyun hoşuna gidiyor ya da durmaktan korkuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Sure, you finish off the killers and swear revenge on their master. You dispatch him and then go looking for whoever the 'real' culprit is. Just admit that you enjoy it — or that you're just afraid to stop."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii, katillerin işini bitir ve efendilerinden intikam almaya yemin et. Onu da öldür ve 'gerçek' suçluyu aramaya koyul. İtiraf et, ya hoşuna gidiyor ya da durmaktan korkuyorsun."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
